testcase.name: 1.6.1 - Multiple filing indicators for the same reporting unit
testcase.description: An instance document MUST contain only one filing indicator element for a given reporting unit ("template").

variation.description: XBRL instance with no duplicated filing indicators.
XBRL instance with duplicated value for a filing indicator in one tuple.
XBRL instance with duplicated value for a filing indicator in two tuples.
XBRL instance with the same filing indicator declared as reported and not reported.
